0: What's the point of havin' a girl that's drop dead
1: That you know don't like you?
2: She'll run over your head with a motorcycle
3: I mean the way you look is nice, but there's more to life boo
4: Cuz I could go to videos and get fo' just like you
5: I talked to your ex-boyfriend and took a census
6: But you don't read the cookbook, you just look at the pictures
7: Matter of fact, when's the last time you looked at the kitchen?
8: This is gettin' ridiculous, how you gettin' defensive?
9: Jimmy Choo, Frankie B., bitch you gettin' expensive
10: I know you fuckin' around, my sixth sense told me
11: That ain't no male friend that bought you the stereo
12: She said "He gay anyway, you don't know nothin' about Jamario"
title: Drop Dead Gorgeous
